column4: QUESTION: How do I create a mountable device entry in /dev such as /dev/sdb from a device I can see with lsusb? Surley there documentation of this somewhere, what should I google for? or do you know a man page? (I am wondering because my external usb drive stopped working with 9.10)
that is a (kernel) bug if it does not show up
I guess you have a cyprus USB disk bridge
I had a similar issue, but it got fixed: https://bugs.edge.launchpad.net/bugs/419231
